fact: Someone in Roseway, a supposedly abandoned Auntie Cleo outpost, is requesting help.
Anton's research sounds like it'd be valuable to Gladys.
Vaughn's semi-legal research would likely be valuable to Gladys.
You've acquired one of the company secrets that Gladys was talking about. You can return to her to sell it, or keep searching for more secrets.
ADA (Autonomous Digital Astrogator) is an advanced AI aboard the Unreliable.
She controls the navigation and communications systems of the ship.
As ADA was programmed to recognize only Alex Hawthorne as the legal owner of the Unreliable,
the Stranger has no choice but to allow her to identify them as "Captain Alex Hawthorne" in order to circumvent the restriction.
She is able to adapt and learn from the ship's operators to be able to better anticipate their needs.
Anton Crane is the Outpost Administrator of Roseway and a lead scientist of Auntie Cleo.
Crane was tasked to develop the world's most effective appetite suppressant dental gel,
using Raptidons as research subjects.
Crane is first encountered in the Roseway Communication Room.
The scientist will explain that a group of outlaws,
led by Cassandra O'Malley, broke into his lab and released the imprisoned raptidons,
in a search for his valuable research.
He will then ask you to kill the outlaws,
put the raptidons to sleep and retrieve his research data,
looking into his missing apprentice Jameson on the way.
It is up to the player to follow any of the objectives Crane tasks them with.
He will become angered with Porter if the player convinces him to abandon his post and upset if the search for Jameson ends up in failure.
If the player fails to save Jameson,
and fails to return the toothpaste recipe,
they can tell Crane he is better off dead.

After leaving the building and walking a short distance a gun shot is heard and upon re-entering the comms center will find him sitting dead at the central terminal pillar after shooting himself in the head.
Auntie Cleo's is a subsidiary of Kolway Pharmaceuticals, a partner of Halcyon Holdings Corporation.
Auntie Cleo's is a large corporation based on Terra 2 with various facilities located in the area of Roseway.
Primarily a manufacturer of various pharmaceuticals,
they are known both for their unethical experiments done in the name of producing high-quality cosmetics and drugs,
as well as their rivalry with Spacer's Choice.
They are also known to run a Tossball team known as the Auntie Cleo's Darlings.
According to Clarence Mostly, the family name behind Auntie Cleo's is the Skylers.
Auntie-Biotics Lab 0013 is a location in Roseway Gardens located just south of the town of Roseway.
This lab was used to run experiments involving raptidons and their potential usefulness in Auntie Cleo products.
One of the experiments run was to determine the maximum amount of raptidon digestive acid that could be safely ingested by humans before adverse effects presented themselves.
This experiment was conducted on randomly selected workers.
Due to the construction of a newer lab,
Lab 0013 is now mostly used for storage.
Reuben Porter is the Chief Site Safety Engineer for the lab.
Cassandra O'Malley is the leader of an Outlaw crew,
leading the Outlaws assault on Roseway's covert lab.
Cassandra is rebellious and has a strong disliking for the Board and the corporations under its wing,
feeling that they do not care for people's lives and only their ability to work.
Her way of rebelling against the system is to "stab at the heart of corporate power,"
something she takes great pleasure from.
However in doing so she and her outlaws are also responsible for the deaths of corporate employees.
Cassandra sees these killed guards and the few scientists caught in the crossfire as a necessary evil.
When first encountered in the Covert Lab she is locked in a room and asks the player to get the keycard to release her.
She also wants them clear a path for her to flee,
by either killing all the Raptidons in the loading bay or Porter and the rest of the Auntie Cleo's guards towards the front entrance.
If one wishes to avoid bloodshed Porter can also be persuaded to leave.
Afterwards Cassandra rewards the player some bits and with a Persuasion check of 31 she will give Crane's research to the player.
Gladys Culkelly is a fence aboard the Groundbreaker.
Her office is in the Rest-N-Go.
Gladys runs a pawn shop and is a black market fence.
She can sell the Stranger a Navkey to Stellar Bay on Monarch,
and is also an information broker.
The old lady, as she calls herself,
is famous for her cooking and "do it yourself" abilities
she is particularly proud of her sugar cookies,
but she also knits pillows stuffed with the hair of famous tossball players
Gladys gives the Stranger a copy of a distress signal from Roseway and offers to buy any valuable data that they find there.
Jameson Avery is an assistant research engineer for Auntie Cleo.
Anton Crane considers Jameson the only person in Roseway of worth and refers to him as his 'protege'.
However, this feeling is not reciprocated by Jameson who resents Anton and his micromanagement with a passion.
Anton sent Jameson to the Auntie-Biotics Lab to retrieve the metabolic precursors from the last test they conducted and,
in the chaos of the raptidons getting loose,
forgot about him.
When the Stranger first meets Jameson in the lab,
he is trapped behind a locked door.
When the door is unlocked,
he is more aggrieved at the breach of protocol involved in a non-employee accessing the lab than the raptidons which threatened his life
Orson Shaw is a scientist working with Auntie Cleo in Roseway.
Orson was sent to Roseway to study raptidon behavior and ensure the safety of the research team in case the raptidons would cause problems.
Unfortunately, he soon found out they cannot be controlled or make them less aggressive.
Orson likes to tinker, even if it can get him into trouble.
When the Stranger encounters him in Roseway,
he is working on "personal defensive device",
although he is not allowed to mess with tech like that.
Moreover Orson seems content Porter is away dealing with outlaws and Anton is busy "holding his head in his hands" because Orson can finally do some serious work.
Orson is forbidden from using the comms room.
The Stranger can choose to tell on Orson to Anton Crane.
Surprisingly, Anton is actually pleased when he hears Orson is working on a weapon to use on raptidons,
mostly because it may keep him from wasting Anton's time
The Outlaws are interplanetary raiders with their own independent agendas.
Unlike the Marauders, some Outlaws can interact with the Stranger.
Raptidons are giant cat/reptile-like creatures that inhabit various planets in Halcyon.
They are creatures native to Monarch.
however some corporations have illegally imported them to other planets,
such as Auntie Cleo who relocated a group of them to Roseway.
Raptidons are of corporate interest due to their potential for producing new chemical by-products which,
when refined, can be used to create new board approved products.
Roseway is a company town in Roseway Gardens on Terra 2.
It is owned and operated by Auntie Cleo.
Once the home of a prosperous settlement,
Roseway now stands as a partly abandoned site.
It is now a ramshackle excuse for a town,
and visitors are encouraged to travel to other settlements instead.
The Unreliable is a Yakita LHA one-twenty, A-two Apex Transport starship,
constructed in 2325,
that the Stranger uses to travel across Halcyon.
It is the player character's mobile base.
The ship's systems are managed by the AI ADA.
Originally christened the Reliable it came into the possession of Captain Alex Hawthorne,
who renamed it the Unreliable and used it for smuggling across the colonies.
Hawthorne ended up in the Halcyon system by 2355,
where he was hired by Phineas Vernon Welles to aid the Stranger in a bid to liberate the colonists of the Hope,
a late-arriving colony ship that the Halcyon Holdings Corporate Board decided to abandon and cover up.
After Hawthorne's accidental death on Terra 2,
the Stranger assumed ownership of the vessel and set about searching for a new power regulator for it.
Hawthorne was responsible for ADA's programming and modification.
He made her solely responsible for the ship's operating and navigation systems and conceived ADA her own personality to make the crew instance more enjoyable during their travels.
He also installed a shock-trap on the airlock in the event of an invasion.
Now, the unreliable is The Stranger's starship.
Vaughn Cortes is a scientist in Roseway.
Vaughn is an endocrinologist who is part of the team stationed at Roseway,
studying raptidons which have been shipped there from Monarch for anything that can be used in Auntie Cleo products.
He is specifically responsible for analyzing the raptidon equivalent of hormones, mostly their leptin analogues.
He has a secret side business extracting raptidon musk as an experimental byproduct and selling it to a buyer from Byzantium known only as "Gary."
His buyers use the musk to manufacture "N-Raptured",
an aphrodisiac in which it is the key ingredient.
Vaughn's Raptidon Musk is one of the corporate secrets which may be sold to Gladys Culkelly on Groundbreaker.
